rComments: Gabriela is amazing.  Se is clear, thorough, and the most ready to help professor I've ever had. In fact, she's the best professor I've ever had. I loved taking her for germ1-3 and am really excited to return to her for germ6.  AND she is funny and inspirational. No one compares!

She is a wonderful teacher. I am saddened that she only teachers 1-3, because I would love to have her through German 6. I highly recommend her. She is clear and thorough, and if you are confused her office hours really help and she is more than willing to make extra appointments.

I love Gabriella. She is thorough, thoughtful, intelligent, and is really great at clarifying questions. She focuses on what the class is struggling with and goes at a great pace. I really enjoy this class and am taking german 1-3 with her and wish she was teaching all the classes!!

Only take Frank if you want an easy A. We spent 80% of class time just sitting around and doing practically nothing. She's very nice, and easy to get an A with, but you will NOT learn much German. If you want to work harder and really understand the language, take Campbell. Abrams is also really good, but Campbell's style is more effective.
